name: Toony Catch Game by Olmeda
description:
Goal: 

Slide the bag left and right in order to capture the coins and avoid the bombs.

Attributions: 

All sounds and music were made by me using FL Studios and Leshy SFX Maker.

Background Link: Toontown wallpaper - SF Wallpaper

The rest of the art was made by me using Photoshop.

This Game was made on Unity.
